page.title: 17YOUTH FACILITIES
page.content: In Blofield Heath there is a youth club for young people between 8 and 12 held each week in the Community Centre, when there is music and games such as table tennis and pool. A new venture playground is being built, with new swings, climbing frames and similar apparatus, and much money for this has been raised by fetes and jumble sales. There used to be a youth club for older children, held on a Wednesday evening, but this closed in the summer of 1984, due to a lack of support and a certain amount of prejudice against teenagers, as their activities were thought likely to disturb the neighbourhood.
